text:
[Verse]
Woke up in a dream
Where the stars align
Time slips like a stream
Moments lost in time

[Verse 2]
Day turns into night
Searching for the signs
Under pale moonlight
Whispered secret lines

[Chorus]
Lost in the rhythm
Heartbeats in the dark
Chasing ghostly visions
Follow the spark

[Verse 3]
Footprints in the sand
Washed away so fast
Memories in hand
Never meant to last

[Bridge]
Echoes in the wind
Voices from the past
Wonder where they've been
Time goes so fast

[Chorus]
Lost in the rhythm
Heartbeats in the dark
Chasing ghostly visions
Follow the spark
title: Lost in Time
